text: dates are a great way to satisfy your
sweet tooth and still stay away from
refined sugar these coconut date bars
are no bake and they're made in two
seconds they're so so fast
so first let's examine dates you need 1
pound of pitted dates these are super
soft medjool what you want to see is if
you can squeeze them between your
fingers I call this the squeeze test if
you can squeeze them between your
fingers you can proceed with this recipe
these days are often found in gourmet
stores
you might also pick up these dates which
are also in the grocery store they're a
little bit more dry and firm so to use
these dates for this recipe pulse them
in the food processor for a couple of
seconds and if your dates are very dry
give them a rough chop before you pulse
them process them until a paste forms
and then continue with the recipe but
now with our soft dates let's go ahead
and start assembling sprinkle 2
tablespoons of coconut I'm using
unsweetened small coconut flakes here
just along the bottom of a square pan
now we'll take our soft pitted dates I
like to just arrange them evenly along
the bottom and then this is the fun part
and a great place to have small hands
help you in the kitchen we're just going
to squish them down until they form a
single layer piece of parchment is
really helpful here if you were using
this state make sure you would just load
that into the pan and spread it out
evenly all right this looks nice and
even finish this off top the dates with
a quarter cup of toasted chopped walnuts
this not only adds a really nice crunch
to our nice soft chewy dates but good
amount of heart-healthy good for you
fats now we're going to finish with the
rest of the coconut flakes this is about
a tablespoon and then I always like to
add a little bit of sea salt flaky sea
salt when I'm cooking with dates
that's a nice texture and the nice
contrast to the dates sweetness now
we're ready to serve that easy
just cut the bars use a small offset
spatula to remove the squares looks
great
smells wonderful too right mmm coconut
date bars the perfect bite when you're
craving something sweet
